website_summaries.verdict: The best personal fire blanket to choose when you want a quick way to deal with flames.
pros: Small blanket is ideal for emergencies inside
Suffocates fires when a fire extinguisher is not handy
cons: Fiberglass construction can cause itching when wearing the blanket

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few months ago and stored it under the kitchen sink and forgot about it. Yesterday one of my kids forgot about something he put in the toaster oven and luckily I happened to walk in the room as it burst into flames. Our fire extinguisher didn’t work, I remembered the fire blanket and grabbed that. It was easy to open and use. I threw it on the flames, unplugged the toaster oven, and readjusted the blanket to cover the fire more fully. It put the fire out before it spread fairly quickly. I only wish that the blanket was a little bigger and that it wasn’t one time use. I ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: LorieDE

customer_reviews.title: LIfe-saving product!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was foolishly heating up a burrito-sized tortilla in my toaster nad had gone upstairs when I smelled smoke! I bolted back to the kitchen to see flames shooting out of the toaster! I quickly grabbed the Fire Blanked from where I had nailed the pouch to the pantry door and smothered the flames. Opearation waas a complete success! This fire could have easily gotten out of control but the product worked perfectly. Thank you Hot Headz!

product_meta.title: Hot Headz H-FIR-BLN100 Fire Blanket, 36 x 36-Inch, Red
product_meta.description: Add a layer of safety and peace of mind to your home during the holidays. When things get out of control while cooking, the Fire blanket is there to extinguish any small fire. Easy to use with no training required. Simply pull down the tabs, remove the blanket from the hanging pouch and calmly place over the cooking fire to smother the flames. A recent study by FEMA concluded 31% of home structure fires involved cooking equipment. Extinguishes fire by suffocating it. Extinguishes both liquid and grease fire. ".
feature_bullets: KEEP YOURSELF SAFE: Extinguishes fire by suffocating it; extinguishes both liquid and grease fires
MESS-FREE: Unlike the fire extinguishers, the fire blanket does not leave a mess after a fire
VERSATILE: Ideal for the kitchen, fireplace, grill, car, camping
USEFUL IN SURVIVAL SITUATIONS: Can also be used to wrap around your body and act as a heat shield
SPECIFICATIONS: Meets ASTM F1989-05 Specifications for cooking fire suppression
